text:
Box 255
Iowa City, Iowa
August 9> 1956
Mr. Harry Skornia, F^Kec. Director
National Ass’n. Educational Broadcasters
Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Skornia:
I am a memember of the faculty of Northwest Community College, University of
Whoming at Powell, and have been on leave studying at the St&te University of
Iowa during the past year.
It has been a real privilege and pleasure to have had the opportunity to
listen to many of the programs of the NAEB over station WSUI, and I should
appreciate receiving full particulars regarding types and costs of institution¬
al membership in your organization.
Very truly yours,
i
